title: error when saving big objects
body_html:
a = np.zeros(1000000000)
torch.save(a, 'a.pkl')

will fail with:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/guismay/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 120, in save
    return _save(obj, f, pickle_module, pickle_protocol)
  File "/home/guismay/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 186, in _save
    pickler.dump(obj)
SystemError: error return without exception set

However,

a = np.zeros(1000000000)
torch.save(torch.from_numpy(a), 'a.pkl')

Seems to work properly.
body_text:
a = np.zeros(1000000000)
torch.save(a, 'a.pkl')
will fail with:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/guismay/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 120, in save
    return _save(obj, f, pickle_module, pickle_protocol)
  File "/home/guismay/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 186, in _save
    pickler.dump(obj)
SystemError: error return without exception set

However,
a = np.zeros(1000000000)
torch.save(torch.from_numpy(a), 'a.pkl')
Seems to work properly.
body:
```python
a = np.zeros(1000000000)
torch.save(a, 'a.pkl')
```

will fail with:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/guismay/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 120, in save
    return _save(obj, f, pickle_module, pickle_protocol)
  File "/home/guismay/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 186, in _save
    pickler.dump(obj)
SystemError: error return without exception set
```

However,
```python
a = np.zeros(1000000000)
torch.save(torch.from_numpy(a), 'a.pkl')
```
Seems to work properly.
